Canvas Tote.productDescription:
AnvilEco™ 100% recycled cotton canvas. Self-fabric straps with reinforced sewing.
Size 13” x 15½” x 7½”.

Men's Protect t-shirt.productDescription: Groovy Globe’s Men’s PROTECT t-shirt is 50% ORGANIC Cotton and 50% RPET (made from plastic bottles) fabric. Environmentally friendly and extremely soft. Made in the USA.

Men’s T-shirt.productDescription: Groovy Globe Men’s T-shirt is an Anvil Organic® Pre-shrunk 5.0 oz. 100% certified organic cotton t-shirt.

Women’s Classic Fit T-Shirt.productDescription: Groovy Globe Women’s t-shirt is an Anvil Sustainable™ Pre-shrunk 4.8 oz. 50% organic cotton and 50% post-consumer P.E.T. recycled polyester.
